column4: i installed jaunty, in compiz, i enabled top, bottom images, also different wallpapers in each worlspace, but nothing is seen, but cube and other effects are working, help please
why is images not been seen in top and wallpapers?
FYI only -- you can't have different wallpaper on each workspace unless you disable Nautilus from drawing your background (meaning you can't see ANY icons on your desktop)
